item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Installation We won’t cover further details how to properly setup Prometheus itself, we will only cover some basic setup based on docker-compose. But if you want to run this exporter without docker-compose you should be able to adopt that to your needs. First of all we need to prepare a configuration for Prometheus that includes the exporter as a target based on a static host mapping which is just the docker-compose container name, e.

item.title: Building
item.description: As this project is built with Go you need to install Go first. The installation of Go is out of the scope of this document, please follow the official documentation. After the installation of Go you need to get the sources: git clone https://github.com/promhippie/hetzner_exporter.git cd hetzner_exporter/ All required tool besides Go itself are bundled by Go modules, all you need is part of the Makfile: make generate build Finally you should have the binary within the bin/ folder now, give it a try with .

item.title: License
item.description: This project is licensed under the Apache 2.0 license. For the license of the used libraries you have to check the respective sources.
